ModMetaData.name: Rim of Madness - Vampires
ModMetaData.author: Jecrell
ModMetaData.description:
V1.18.0.0 Adds vampires to RimWorld.
Heavily inspired by Vampire the Masquerade, this mod introduces a disease known as vampirism. There are five Vampire bloodlines included with the mod currently. Different bloodlines have different abilities: 46 in total. Adds in "vitae" and blood mechanics (check the needs menu).
REQUIRES JECSTOOLS TO PLAY
